Package org.example.timetracker.Controller

Class TimeTrackerRestController

java.lang.Object
org.example.timetracker.Controller.TimeTrackerRestController
@RestController @EnableAspectJAutoProxy public class TimeTrackerRestController extends Object
REST controller for managing users, tasks, and time tracking.

    • getSumUserDurationForPeriod

      @GetMapping("/api/user/tracking/sum/period") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getSumUserDurationForPeriod(@RequestParam("userID") Long userID, @RequestParam("startTime") String startTime, @RequestParam("endTime") String endTime)
      Retrieves the total work duration for a specific user over a specified period.
      Parameters:
      userID - the user ID
      startTime - the start time of the period
      endTime - the end time of the period
      Returns:
      the response entity with total duration or error message

    • getUserDurationsForPeriod

      @GetMapping("/api/user/tracking/durations/period") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getUserDurationsForPeriod(@RequestParam("userID") Long userID, @RequestParam("startTime") String startTime, @RequestParam("endTime") String endTime)

      Parameters:
      userID - the user ID
      startTime - the start time of the period
      endTime - the end time of the period

      the response entity with list of task durations or error message
